text: Alfred Martin may refer to: *Alf Martin, British footballer, secretary-manager of Lincoln City F.C. in 1896/1897 *Alfred Martin (baseball) (1928–1989), known as Billy, American baseball player *Alfred Martin (painter) (1888–1950), Belgian artist; see Catalog of paintings in the Louvre Museum *Alfred Martin (Indian Army officer) (1853–1926), British officer in the Indian Army ==See also== *Al Martin (disambiguation) *Alfred Ridley-Martin (1881–1970), British fencer *Alfred Marten (1829–1910), politician * *
title: Alfred Martin
